title: Would it be bad if Gathering Storm have 3rd adaptive for tanks?
body: What if Gathering Storm would have a 3rd adaptive option? Giving HP if you build tank items? Would this be too broken? Currently tanks don't have a scaling rune. Why add something new when Riot could modify current one?

replies.body:
But... they do have a scaling rune?

It's called Overgrowth

> [{quoted}](name=nelogis,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=inYbve9J,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-22T07:30:05.956+0000)
>
> But... they do have a scaling rune?
> 
> It's called Overgrowth

This. Also Grasp.

Sorcery already went from the "Mage" tree to the "Go fast" tree.

I don't want it to become a Tank tree as well.

I'm pretty sure the Sorcery tree is supposed to be primarily for offense though right? You could still make the argument that there are some offensive runes in Resolve and other defensive ones in Sorcery though I suppose. It's definitely not a bad idea to play around with though!
